meanings.definition: The skin covering the top of the human head
meanings.sent1: He felt the wind on his scalps as he walked in the sun.
meanings.sent2: Her long hair covered her scalps, protecting them from the sun.
meanings.sent3: The hat was jealous of the scalps for getting all the attention.
meanings.sent4: The scalps of the mountain were covered in snow, resembling a white blanket.
meanings.sent5: The barber carefully washed the scalps before cutting the hair.

meanings.definition: To remove the scalp of (someone) as a trophy
meanings.sent1: The warrior scalps his enemies to show his bravery in battle.
meanings.sent2: The pirate scalps his victims to instill fear in others.
meanings.sent3: The chef scalps the potatoes quickly to prepare them for cooking.
meanings.sent4: The hunter scalps the deer to honor its spirit in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The collector scalps rare coins to add to his valuable collection.
